scripts.test:internet:dev: cross-env ENV=dev APP=theInternet npx playwright test --update-snapshots
scripts.test:internet:qa: cross-env ENV=qa APP=theInternet npx playwright test
scripts.test:internet:prod: cross-env ENV=prod APP=theInternet npx playwright test
scripts.test:opencart:dev: cross-env ENV=dev APP=opencart npx playwright test
scripts.test:opencart:qa: cross-env ENV=qa APP=opencart npx playwright test
scripts.test:opencart:prod: cross-env ENV=prod APP=opencart npx playwright test
scripts.test:smoke:dev: cross-env ENV=dev APP=theInternet npx playwright test --grep "@smoke"
scripts.test:regression:dev: cross-env ENV=dev APP=theInternet npx playwright test --grep "@regression"
scripts.test:load: artillery run --output results.json login-test.yml && node Report_Script/JmeterConsoleReport.js
scripts.test:youtube:dev: cross-env ENV=dev APP=youtube npx playwright test
scripts.test:youtube:qa: node ./export-cookies.js && cross-env ENV=qa APP=youtube npx playwright test
scripts.test:youtube:prod: cross-env ENV=prod APP=youtube npx playwright test
scripts.test:youtube:auth-setup: cross-env ENV=dev APP=youtube npx playwright test auth-setup.spec.js --headed
